Our Team
Glen Barclay
CEO / Executive Producer
Call glenbarclay2995 on Skype
Enter your email address below to receive my contact card in your inbox.
— or
click here
to download my vCard now —
Glen is the Executive Producer of IBA MUSIC and has spent over 30 years producing and directing live entertainment shows for the hospitality industry in Central Florida. He has a wealth of expertise and experience in the corporate, theme park and world music entertainment scenes. Glen also has extensive knowledge in the preparation and presentation of live stage productions. He is responsible for overseeing the daily operations of IBA, including live shows in Central Florida’s major theme parks. As a business executive and former musician, Glen understands both sides and strike the perfect balance to keep clients and musicians happy. His unique eye for talent and his extraordinary business skills have propelled Glen to be one of the most trusted and sought-after sources for authentic world music and entertainment to corporate clients in Central Florida.
Nicholas Culp
Booking Director / Audio Engineer / Event Coordinator / DJ City Beat / Bachatero ;)
Call nicholasculp on Skype
Enter your email address below to receive my contact card in your inbox.
As an experienced talent scout with over 17 years experience in the industry, Nicholas is an audio-visual expert who plays a key role in many parts of the IBA organization. He controls the technical aspects of IBA’s business, supports the growing network of entertainers and controls day-to-day operations. With an Associate’s Degree in Recording Arts and Bachelor’s Degree in Entertainment Business, Nicholas has also engineered for the best of IBA’s talent at world-class events and theme parks across Central and South Florida. Nicholas is also responsible for the organization, scheduling, and coordination of the company’s talent for a range of clients, from private functions to large scale corporate events. His versed, accurate ear for music and sound has helped to maintain the high standard of live music delivered by IBA at all events.
Mari Santana
Director of Communications
Enter your email address below to receive my contact card in your inbox.
— or
click here
to download my vCard now —
Mari Santana is our Communications Specialist and Multicultural Branding Specialist. She is a fully bilingual, bi-cultural, award-winning veteran broadcast journalist, news anchor, producer, and reporter.
As a 15 year Walt Disney Co. spokesperson and public relations executive, she gained an impressive hands-on experience in the successful launch of over 100 global impact products and events. She is our go-to expert in delivering world-class event planning, public relations, marketing, media training, message development & storytelling to our clients.

About
"We create engaging experiences and lasting memories."
- Glen Barclay, executive producer
IBA WAS ESTABLISHED TO FEED OUR PASSION for PROVIDING UNIQUE ENTERTAINMENT OPTIONS WITHOUT COMPROMISE.
We originally started as a band in 1988 named ISLAND BREEZE. In 1995, we were the Pregame Opening act for Super Bowl XXIX in Miami, Florida along with Sergio Mendes and Hank Williams, Jr. Over the past 35 years, we have blossomed into a full-blown talent resource and production agency for some of the most demanding players in the industry. We offer live music entertainment solutions to private and corporate clients and we also produce daily atmosphere shows for the largest theme parks in the country, which has been a catalyst for our continued growth.
The unique concept of IBA MUSIC allows us to deliver a high-quality service that your audience will love. We embrace multiculturalism and our cast of international and domestic entertainers can be seen in the many of the major theme parks and other live music venues here in Central Florida.
Our roster of acts is the most diverse in the area and can run the gamut from trendy to traditional or contemporary to folkloric. Performers are handpicked from all over the world or developed internally by our team of professionals with a specific purpose of fulfilling the need to provide excellence in entertainment programming. If you want to bring your next party to life, IBA can be the perfect partner for you.
Interested in booking an event?
GET IN TOUCH
